questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A dog

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A dog playing in a park
B) A dog standing on a ledge
C) A dog swimming in a pool
D) A dog sleeping on a couch

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The background scenery
B) The dog
C) The tree
D) The ledge

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A house
C) A dog
D) A fence

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A busy street
C) Houses and trees
D) A beach

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A dog standing on a ledge
B) A cat sitting
C) A person walking
D) A car parked

What type of dog is shown in the photo?
A) A small white dog
B) A large brown dog
C) A medium black dog
D) A small black dog

What color is the fence in the background?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White
D) Green

What is the color of the house in the background?
A) Yellow
B) Red
C) Gray and white
D) Blue

What is the texture of the ledge the dog is standing on?
A) Smooth
B) Rough and weathered
C) Polished
D) Covered in grass

What is the dog’s tail doing?
A) Wagging
B) Curled up
C) Hanging down
D) It is not visible

A) Yes, fully visible
B) Partially visible
C) Blurred out
D) Not visible at all

What is the color of the dog’s fur?
A) Black
B) Brown
C) White
D) Gray

B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Stone

What is the dog’s posture?
A) Sitting
B) Standing
C) Lying down
D) Running

Are there any other animals visible in the photo?
A) Yes, another dog
B) Yes, a cat
C) No, just one dog
D) Yes, a bird

A) Retractable leash
B) Chain leash
C) Rope leash
D) Leather leash

A) Yes, cracks and wear
B) No, it looks new
C) Yes, covered in graffiti
D) No, but it is dirty

A) Smooth and short
B) Curly and dense

A) Dark brown
B) Light brown
C) Gray
D) Black

What is the primary color of the dog’s leash?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black

Is the ground beneath the ledge visible?
A) Yes, clearly visible
B) Partially visible
C) No, not visible at all

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Green

What is the texture of the tree bark?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Polished
D) Covered in moss

A) Leather
B) Fabric
C) Metal
D) Plastic

A) Yes, several people
B) Yes, one person
C) No, no people

A) The tree
